itemDescription: British recipient of the Victoria Cross

wikipedia_page.main: Colonel William St. Lucien Chase VC CB (2 July 1856 – 24 June 1908) was a recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * William St Lucien Chase (1856–1908), recipient of the Victoria Cross
